overview: A collection of old-time silent movies, re-scored and narrated, featuring the most popular silent film stars.  Includes: 1. Pathé 1900 Bathing Beauties fron Venice, California 2. Goodness Gracious with Clara Kimball Young and Sidney Drew 3. A Drunkard's Reformation Directed by D.W. Griffith
title: Flicker Flashbacks #2
